倢字的基本解释

倢
jié
〔倢伃（
y?）〕古同“婕妤”，中国汉朝宫中女官名。

倢字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jié］
［《廣韻》疾葉切，入葉，從。］
亦作“偼1”。
敏捷；灵敏。
[②]［jié］
［《集韻》即涉切，入葉，精。］
亦作“偼2”。

倢字的康熙字典解释

【子集中】【人字部】　倢； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页108第13
【廣韻】【韻會】【正韻】疾葉切【集韻】卽涉切，?音接。倢伃，漢婦官名。倢婕通。　又與捷通。斜出貌，利也，便也。【揚子·方言】宋楚之閒謂之倢。

倢字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
倢字的起名意思

敏捷；灵敏。

personable
Basic explanation of words
personable
jié
〔倢伃 (
y?)] Gu Tong "Jie Yu", the name of the female official in the Chinese Han Dynasty.
personable
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jié］
["Guangyun" cut leaves quickly, enter the leaves, follow. ]
Also known as "偼1".
Agile; sensitive.
[②]［jié］
["Jiyun" refers to cutting, entering leaves, and refined. ]
Also known as "偼2".
personable

[Guang Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun] Jiye Cut [Ji Yun] 卽 involved cut,? Phonetic connection.倢伃, the official name of a woman in the Han Dynasty. Chi Jietong.　And Jietong again. Oblique appearance, good and easy. 【Yangtze Dialect】Soong Chu's leisure is called Chi.
